opis: We offer comprehensive solutions related to the supply of vegetable oils and the collection and storage of used cooking oils.
liSekcja3_1: Vegetable oils from gastronomic premises or food production enterprises.
liSekcja3_2: Animal fats CAT.1, CAT.2 and CAT.3 - from meat processing plants.
liSekcja3_3: Fatty acids and other products used for bio-components.
liSekcja4_1: Base oils SN 85, SN 100, SN 150, SN 500, BS 150.
liSekcja4_2: UREA type A (used, for example, in AdBlue production).
liSekcja4_3: Catalysts for biodiesel production: methanol, potassium hydroxide, and sodium hydroxide.
h3Sekcja5_2: Testing and Evaluation of Performance Parameters
h4Sekcja5_1: We thoroughly check the properties of materials and structural elements of machinery and equipment to ensure they can withstand loads and operate reliably.
h4Sekcja5_2: We analyze oils, fuels, and lubricants to ensure they meet requirements and provide optimal machine performance.
h4Sekcja5_3: We provide reliable opinions and expertise on tested samples and applied technological processes.
h4Sekcja5_4: We conduct inspections and verifications of technological installations to identify potential problems and ensure their safe and efficient operation.
